S.FORM: bangcalay a tatayna atu l'causay a aadupan (kamu nu Hulam: ) kakungkuan a kawaw (Prince Adam). yumahida sa, idaw ku mabataday nu kanatal idaw ku cacaya a talahaday mabawbaway ku balucu makatalay a Ya tan wan ce ( , prince Adam). . idaw ku cacayay a demiad salabi sa maudad tabaki ku bali, idaw ku cacaya a micidekay ku la'cus a babalaki tayni itniyi i cen paw , mangalay tuna nikapetan tu bangcalay a sicekaay a balu mangalay miliyun tu sapilabinaw ci wan ceanan, nika ci wan ce macikien la'cusen cinidaan bahbah han ni wance kiya babalaki, edep hantu nida ku pana', ya la'cusay a babalaki alaw masumad mala bangcalay a sian niw . . ci sian niw hantu mangalay mibakin tina talahaday a wan ce mala lacusay a mapaydangay a aadupan, cen paw nu tademaw mala sakaudip nu cancanan atu tatakalan, pabali han nida tu dadingu' atu caaya ka cebal nu sicekaay a balu sipabeli ci wan cean. . idasa ci wan ce i sadikuday nu nikapecaan nu balu amahetik sa amatineng tunu tademawan, satimaan han ala amalawpes, anunayi ku sakalawpes, nika udip nida hidasatu malapaydangay nu aadupan. (Belle) . . Be el (Belle, ), cacaysa itida i Fa kuo nu adidi'ay a niyadu manamuh mibelihay tu cudad a limucedan, sisa ci Be el (Belle, ) hina libut tina niyaduan caaya kasumad kuni kaudipan, mangalay pasayda i cudad mikilim tu balihenaway a sakaudip. . mikihida tu niyaduay a limuceda, hinacudaday icudad ci Be el (Belle, ) kaisa ku katuuday milihida cinidaan, caay katapa ku mapelukay a cacabayan. (Mo wey se) . wama ni Be el (Belle, ) ci Mu wey se (Mo wey se, ) u sitangahay matinengay mikinkiw tu cancanan a kawawan, sawni mikinkiw tu cancanan caay ka laheci kuni kinkiwan tu tuud katawantu nu niyaduay a tademaw u maapaay han cinida. . mangalay cinida milihida tu sapisetset tuni kinkiw nida tu tiyun hannanay malineng tu ku sapiletek tu kasuy a kikayan, alaen nida ku nikinkiwan tu masangaay malingad tayda i sakasetsetan a dadan mungangaw ku culil, manglay cinida miliyas tuni lalabaan nu kuyu a wacu pacebasatu micumud i cenpaw micaliw milabin. (Beast) . ci l'causay a aadupan (Beast) maadih nida ku caaya kaw kaka tinengan a tademaw micumud mapatay nu linges, pulul hantu nida ci Mu wey se (Mo wey se, ) i papululan. (Gaston) (Lefou) . tawya ci Ka se tun (Gaston, ) atu ci Lefou , kanamuhan nu niyaduay a tademaw, pabalucu pasayda i niyaduay u sabangcalay a limucedan ci Be el mikikun kitasa. , . (Fi li pe) . kaiyan ni Be el ku ngalay sananay a tademaw, tabaki masatatama'ay ci Ka se tun (Gaston, ). maadih ni Be el ci subayu Fi li pe sacacay sa taluma caay nayi maadih nida ku wama, kacaw satu cinida ci Fi li pe pasayda i cen paw mikilim. . . mangalay miala ci Be el ci yamaan nida hidasatu milabin. tawya a labii miyukiw ci paydangan a aadupan ci Be el an mapulung kita malabisa, kaiyan ni Be el , ci paydangan a aadupan mapatay nu linges, sakamusa i katuuday amana' pakani ku katuuday tu cancanan. (Lumiere), (Cogsworth), (Mrs. Potts) (Chip) . teban nulabii mapateluh ci Be el taydan nina i paladah mikilim tu kakanen, amica kunipihapu ni paydangan a aadupan tu nakamuan, nika aenengan nu lacik Lu mi er (Lumiere ), tuki Ke se hwa (Cogsworth ), tiwi O cia bai (Mrs. Potts ), atu kupu A ci (Chip ), manamuh tu kataydaan nida mapalaw ku katuuday paadih tui takalay a kakanen cinidaan. . . katuuday a tademaw mangalay papilabin ci Be el mangalay papilawpes tu tatimaan. namamin satu namalabi ci Lumiere atu ci Cogsworth ladayen nuheni ci Be el miadih tu cenpaw, hina paawpaaway ci Be el litawalan nida kiya tatusay haymaw hannida micumud miubiy taydan nida i pabaw mibuhat tu kakabian. . kalapecipecian kiya kakabian u kakabian ni paydangan a aadupan, ci paydangan a aadupan makaadih tuni cumudan ni Be el mapatay nu linges bahbahantu nida ci Be el . . . matawid ci Be el caay pakahemhem tunabalucuan ci paydangan a aadupan tu ni kaynah, kanahatu u teban nulabii, kacawan nida ku subayu ci Fi li pe milaliw. idadan henay lalabaen nu kuyu a wacu, kakalahan satu ci paydangan a aadupan katukuh sa bahbahen nida kiya kuyu a wacu namim, nika ci paydangan a aadupan hida satu maduka mabulilah, ahican tu kiya haw pataluma' hantu ni Be el i cenpaw lihida satu mikukay ci paydangan a aadupan. . ci Mo wey se taluma' satu i niyadu' pasayda ci Gaston miawaw pakaudipen kakusa, nika inai ku palutatengaay ci Mo wey se nakamuan a paydangan a aadupan, micili cinidaan u maapaay kisu han ba'ba'hen naca cinida i kakanen. . paydangan a aadupan maduka satu sadimelen ni Be el amidiput, maadih cinida tuni kacaay ka lipahak ni Be el ngalay saca mangalay mipadang tuci Be el an aw hica ku papadangan numaku sa, pabali hantu nida tu cenpaw aadihan tu cuda ci Be el mala sinubu nida. . sademiad sa kunuheni maladay, paydangan a aadupan hamaw satu masumad ku balucu, ci Be el makaadih tunika sumadan ni paydangan a aadupan tu kapah hamaw satu manamuh cinidaan. . . . lipahak namim namapalaw, paydangan a aadupan palita hanida ci Be el kiya makenud ku bihid numisu han, sakamusatu ci Be el mabulah kaku ci amaan numaku, paydangan a aadupan pacaliw hantu nida ci Be el tu dadingu, ci Be el i dadingu maka makaadih tui dadinguay a babalaki ci amaaku mabulilah tuni kataynian tuni kangalayan miala i takuwanay aidadan. manamuhay ci Be el an a paydangan a aadupan caay kalesen makaadih tuni ka lalum ni Be el , pabalucu satu pakalihalay, lalitumuh satu kunuheni maluwama, sipabeli hantu nida ku dadingu cinidaan. i cenpaway a katuuday a tademaw kaisa makaadih tu pahedekan amalalum. . tawya ci Gaston mangalay makaala ci Be el an, cakayan nida ku maapaay a sakakaay, palulen nida ci Mo wey se u maapaay han a ngangan ku sapulul cinidaan , patalawan nida ci Be el mangalay pakasi acawa cinidaan. . pacudaden nida tuni kacaay kaapa ni ama aku, pacudaden nida tu tatengaay kawaw, ci Be el patahekalen nida ku dadingu paadih ci paydangan a aadupan tu tatengay nu nabalucuan nida pakatineng tu katuuday a palutatengan. . ci Gaston makaadih ci Be el an miadih ci paydangan a aadupan tu wayway nida sasa mainapsa, sakamuen nida ku katuuday a tademaw tuci paydangan a aadupan a sapakatalawan, miwuywuy tu niyaduay a tademaw atayda mipatay ci paydangan a aadupan, pululen nida ci Be el atu ci Mo wey se tangeden i sasa nu luma'. . ci O cia bai a wawa nida ci A ci (Chip ) hamawsa micumud i tisagi ni Be el makatukuh i luma' ni Be el , maadih nida ku kawaw namakayda miala cinida tu sakalihalay nu dinki a sapiletek tu kasuy a kikay sa mapatahekal ci Be el . namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu
